G

Game - package Game
This package contains all main back-end classes that are used in the game.
Game - Class in Game
This program implements a simple game, where short stories are displayed and after that, the player answers simple questions.
Game(Player) - Constructor for class Game.Game
This constructor is simply used play the game with the Player object passed to it.
Game(String, Boolean) - Constructor for class Game.Game
This constructor is used to load or create a new game.
gender - Variable in class GUI.StatsBuilder
A variable to store the player's gender
getAnswers() - Method in class GUI.QuestionsGUI
A method to get the player answers from this class, so they can be evaluated.
getBool() - Method in class GUI.Startup
This is a method that uses Waiter class to wait until newGame variable is initialized.
getCurrent() - Method in class Game.Plan
This method is to get the Plan.currentMinigame.
getExit() - Method in class GUI.Menu
This is a method that uses Waiter class to wait until the exit variable is set
getGender() - Method in class Game.Player
This method is to get the player's Player.gender.
getGender(Object) - Method in class Game.Player
This method is to get the player's Player.rewards.
getHouse() - Method in class Game.Player
This method is to get the player's Player.preferred_house.
getInterests() - Method in class Game.Player
This method is to get the player's Player.interests.
getLogin() - Method in class Game.Player
It is sometimes necessary to get the player's login from the player, for example when the player wants to change some information, a new player is created in the PlayerSetup class and the login needs to be gotten from somewhere to assign it, and this is the place.
getLogin() - Method in class GUI.Startup
This is a method that uses Waiter class to wait until login is not null.
getName() - Method in class Game.Player
This method is used to get Player.name.
getPause() - Method in class GUI.Stories
This method is to get the value of Stories.pause.
getPlanArray() - Method in class Game.Plan
This method is used to get the Plan.array with the String names of the chosen stories.
getPlayer() - Method in class GUI.CreatePlan
A method to get a player with the assigned plan from the GUI.
getPlayer() - Method in class GUI.Menu
This is a method that uses Waiter class to wait until the player is ready for extracting
getPlayer() - Method in class GUI.PlayerSetup
A method to get a player with the assigned plan from the GUI.
getPoints() - Method in class Game.Player
This method is to get the player's Player.points.
getRead() - Method in class GUI.Stories
This method is to get the value of Stories.readTheWholeStory.
getRewards() - Method in class Game.Player
This method is to get the player's Player.rewards.
getStory(int) - Method in class Game.Plan
This method is used to get the story at the given index.
GUI - package GUI
This package contains all the front-end classes that are used in the game and also builders of the GUIs.
GUI - Variable in class Stories.Story
A variable where the Stories GUI class will be saved.
